title: Manchester/Victoria-Shopping District
name: St. Ann's Church
content: St Ann Street, (verger (''parish office''). Sun-Sat daytime, check web site for service times. St. Ann's Church is the main parish church of Manchester and one of only two surviving Medieval churches in the city centre (the other is the cathedral). It is also a venue for many sacred and secular classical music events. A small shop selling books and gifts is open at all times except during services.
